comments:
I use Eclipse 3.2 with EMF 2.2, GEF 3.2, UML 2.0.

Mylar 0.6.2

I have a list of bugs retrieved from bugzilla Bugzilla version 2.19.1+ using the connector for bugzilla v 2.18. When I try to open a bug I get an error dialog box. The editor contains only the "Planning" and "browser" pages. The forms editor is missing.

I could use the same bug database etc. successfully with Eclipse 3.1.2 and Mylar 0.6.0.

-------------- Error details --------------------------------------
Could not create editor via factory: org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaReportEditorFactory@5e60f2

Thanks for posting Wolfram. This was in fact a bug in 6.2 and has now been resolved. As a work around try right-clicking the task and synchronizing. Once synchronized try opening. Failing this the next release (next Friday) will have the fix. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 156104 ***
Sorry for the duplicate! I scanned thru open bugs, so I didn't find the existing one. I'll close this one.
